_comment: This is the English translation file. Path: src/messages/en.json

hero.title: Discover Breakthrough Ideas at FPTU Hackathon
hero.subtitle: Join FPTU students on a journey of creativity and innovation.

services.sectionDescription: A platform for managing hackathon competitions exclusively for FPTU students.
